text: 5.5: Stt 49.9; Ais 11.1; 11.10; Ro 15.12; Hi 7.14; VB 6.1; 22.16Mba guman pana mbe khaŋ na nzuai, “Ndu nzi thari! Ndu mbarara! Mba Zuda Shɨgar Hɨgi Raion, ana mba ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan Devitan nzɨga mbe ma. Ana ntara mbuav, won pana gumgi kambarav mbe mbevigi. Ana mba harathɨgi kendorar vheri mba gava mpɨrigi, ana nta daaŋgip mba gava fhogɨrga tuktɨgi.”
